turns.user_message: Yes, I need a hotel in the moderate price range please.
turns.agent_response: Would you like a hotel in the north or the centre?
turns.reasoning: First turn - user starts Goal 1: finding a moderate-priced hotel. Agent asks relevant clarifying question.

turns.user_message: The north.  But I do need an actual hotel, no guestrooms.
turns.agent_response: I have two hotels available that meet that criteria.  Would you like more information?
turns.reasoning: Continues same hotel search goal, adding constraint about no guestrooms. Agent identifies matching options.

turns.agent_response: Ashley hotel is 2 stars with free internet and free parking lot.
turns.reasoning: Same hotel goal. Agent only provides info about one hotel when user asked about both options.

turns.agent_response: Lovell Lodge is also two stars.  In the moderate price range, located in the North, at 365 milton road. It has free parking and wifi.
turns.reasoning: Same hotel goal - user asks about second hotel option. Agent provides complete information.

turns.user_message: Could you book me a room at one of those? I need it for 6 people and 2 nights starting from saturday.
turns.agent_response: I was able to book you at the Ashley Hotel at 74 chesterton road.  Your Reference number is : PM69RLXB Do you need anything else?
turns.reasoning: Same hotel goal - user moves to booking phase. Agent successfully books room with reference number.

turns.user_message: Thank you so much. That is all I need.
turns.reasoning: Concluding same hotel booking goal. Agent provides appropriate closing.
